alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Butler; Clarion (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 10:04PM EDT until July 26 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Butler County in west central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Armstrong County in west central Pennsylvania... Clarion County in west central Pennsylvania... * Until 1045 PM EDT. * At 1004 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Rimersburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Clarion, Knox, Parker, Sligo, Emlenton, Strattanville, Bruin, Limestone, Shippenville, St. Petersburg, Corsica, Eau Claire, Callensburg, Foxburg, Fisher, Leeper, and Cherry Valley. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 45, and between mile markers 47 and 72. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
